# Chapter 7 — State Management & Resume


To support long runs (sometimes >30 minutes), progress is saved in:

## `cache/progress.json`


### Stored Fields

```json
{
  "processed_crates": 53,
  "total_crates": 120,
  "last_processed_crate": "cool-tui-app",
  "partial_data": { ... }
}
```

## Resume Behavior
```scss
--resume → continue scan  
--force-fresh → ignore progress file
```
